verses.t: And{G2532} I heard{G191} a great{G3173} voice{G5456} out of{G1537} the temple{G3588} saying{G3004} to the seven{G2033} angels{G32}, Go your ways{G5217}, and{G2532} pour out{G1632} the vials{G3588} of the wrath{G3588} of God{G3588} upon{G1519} the earth{G3588}.

And{G2532} the first{G4413} went{G565}, and{G2532} poured out{G1632} his{G846} vial{G3588} upon{G1909} the earth{G3588}; and{G2532} there fell{G1096} a noisome{G2556} and{G2532} grievous{G4190} sore{G1668} upon{G1519} the men{G3588} which{G3588} had{G2192} the mark{G3588} of the beast{G3588}, and{G2532} upon them{G3588} which worshipped{G4352} his{G846} image{G3588}.

And{G2532} the second{G1208} angel{G32} poured out{G1632} his{G846} vial{G3588} upon{G1519} the sea{G3588}; and{G2532} it became{G1096} as{G5613} the blood{G129} of a dead{G3498} man: and{G2532} every{G3956} living{G2198} soul{G5590} died{G599} in{G1722} the sea{G3588}.
And{G2532} the third{G5154} angel{G32} poured out{G1632} his{G846} vial{G3588} upon{G1519} the rivers{G3588} and{G2532} fountains{G3588} of waters{G3588}; and{G2532} they became{G1096} blood{G129}.

And{G2532} I heard{G191} the angel{G3588} of the waters{G3588} say{G3004}, Thou art{G1488} righteous{G1342}, O Lord{G2962}, which art{G5607}, and{G2532} wast{G2258}, and{G2532} shalt be{G3741}, because{G3754} thou hast judged{G2919} thus{G5023}.

For{G3754} they have shed{G1632} the blood{G129} of saints{G40} and{G2532} prophets{G4396}, and{G2532} thou hast given{G1325} them{G846} blood{G129} to drink{G4095}; for{G1063} they are{G1526} worthy{G514}.

And{G2532} I heard{G191} another{G243} out of{G1537} the altar{G3588} say{G3004}, Even so{G3483}, Lord{G2962} God{G3588} Almighty{G3588}, true{G228} and{G2532} righteous{G1342} are thy{G4675} judgments{G3588}.

And{G2532} the fourth{G5067} angel{G32} poured out{G1632} his{G846} vial{G3588} upon{G1909} the sun{G3588}; and{G2532} power{G2739} was given{G1325} unto him{G846} to scorch{G2739} men{G3588} with{G1722} fire{G4442}.

And{G2532} men{G3588} were scorched{G2739} with great{G3173} heat{G2738}, and{G2532} blasphemed{G987} the name{G3588} of God{G3588}, which{G3588} hath{G2192} power{G1849} over{G1909} these{G3778} plagues{G3588}: and{G2532} they repented{G3340} not{G3756} to give{G1325} him{G846} glory{G1391}.

And{G2532} the fifth{G3991} angel{G32} poured out{G1632} his{G846} vial{G3588} upon{G1909} the seat{G3588} of the beast{G3588}; and{G2532} his{G846} kingdom{G3588} was{G1096} full of darkness{G4656}; and{G2532} they gnawed{G3145} their{G846} tongues{G3588} for{G1537} pain{G3588},

And{G2532} blasphemed{G987} the God{G3588} of heaven{G3588} because{G1537} of their{G846} pains{G3588} and{G2532} their{G846} sores{G3588}, and{G2532} repented{G3340} not{G3756} of{G1537} their{G846} deeds{G3588}.

And{G2532} the sixth{G1623} angel{G32} poured out{G1632} his{G846} vial{G3588} upon{G1909} the great{G3173} river{G3588} Euphrates{G3588}; and{G2532} the water{G3588} thereof{G846} was dried up{G3583}, that{G2443} the way{G3588} of the kings{G3588} of{G575} the east{G395} might be prepared{G2090}.

And{G2532} I saw{G1492} three{G5140} unclean{G169} spirits{G4151} like{G3664} frogs{G944} come out of{G1537} the mouth{G3588} of the dragon{G3588}, and{G2532} out of{G1537} the mouth{G3588} of the beast{G3588}, and{G2532} out of{G1537} the mouth{G3588} of the false prophet{G3588}.

For{G1063} they are{G1526} the spirits{G4151} of devils{G1142}, working{G4160} miracles{G4592}, which go forth{G1909} unto{G3588} the kings{G3588} of the earth{G2532} and{G3588} of the whole{G4863} world{G3650}, to gather{G846} them{G1519} to{G4171} the battle{G3588} of that{G3173} great{G3588} day{G3588} of God{G3588} Almighty{G3588}.

Behold{G2400}, I come{G2064} as{G5613} a thief{G2812}. Blessed{G3107} is he{G3588} that watcheth{G1127}, and{G2532} keepeth{G5083} his{G846} garments{G3588}, lest{G2443} he walk{G4043} naked{G1131}, and{G2532} they see{G991} his{G846} shame{G3588}.
And{G2532} he gathered{G4863} them{G846} together{G4863} into{G1519} a place{G3588} called{G2564} in the Hebrew tongue{G1447} Armageddon{G717}.

And{G2532} the seventh{G1442} angel{G32} poured out{G1632} his{G846} vial{G3588} into{G1519} the air{G3588}; and{G2532} there came{G1831} a great{G3173} voice{G5456} out{G575} of the temple{G3588} of heaven{G3588}, from{G575} the throne{G3588}, saying{G3004}, It is done{G1096}.

And{G2532} there were{G1096} voices{G5456}, and{G2532} thunders{G1027}, and{G2532} lightnings{G796}; and{G2532} there was{G1096} a great{G3173} earthquake{G4578}such as{G3634} was{G1096} not{G3756} since{G575} men{G3588} were{G1096} upon{G1909} the earth{G3588}, so mighty{G5082} an earthquake{G4578}, and so{G3779} great{G3173}.

And{G2532} the great{G3173} city{G3588} was divided{G1096} into{G1519} three{G5140} parts{G3313}, and{G2532} the cities{G3588} of the nations{G3588} fell{G4098}: and{G2532} great{G3173} Babylon{G897} came in remembrance{G3415} before{G1799} God{G3588}, to give{G1325} unto her{G846} the cup{G3588} of the wine{G3588} of the fierceness{G3588} of his{G846} wrath{G3588}.
And{G2532} every{G3956} island{G3520} fled away{G5343}, and{G2532} the mountains{G3735} were{G2147} not{G3756} found{G2147}.

And{G2532} there fell{G2597} upon{G1909} men{G3588} a great{G3173} hail{G5464} out of{G1537} heaven{G3588}, every stone about{G5613} the weight of a talent{G5006}: and{G2532} men{G3588} blasphemed{G987} God{G3588} because of{G1537} the plague{G3588} of the hail{G3588}; for{G3754} the plague{G3588} thereof{G846} was{G2076} exceeding{G4970} great{G3173}.
